title: Crude oil production in the United Kingdom, 1920-2016
subtitle: Domestic production of crude oil in the United Kingdom from 1920-2016, measured in gigawatt-hour (GWh) equivalents per year. Production data is measured prior to imports or exports. Estimates of crude oil includes natural gas liquids and feedstocks. Between 1920 and 1962, data includes crude oil from shale oil.
sourceDesc: UK Department for Energy and Climate Change (DECC)
